SA21n1412:3: tatrādau om hrīṃ svāhā 3 kāyaviśodhane svāhā |
SA21n1412:4: iti mantreṇa tridhā ācamya pūjābhāṇḍasaṃkalpaṃ kuryāt |
SA21n1412:5: tadyathā - om adya śrīmacchrītyādinā saṃkalpoccāraṇānantaramidaṃ mantraṃ paṭhet |
SA21n1412:6: om namo bhagavate puṣpaketurājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya |
SA21n1412:7: tadyathā - om puṣpe 2 mahāpuṣpe supuṣpe puṣpodbhave puṣpasaṃbhave puṣpāvakiraṇe svāhā |

SA21n1412:11: om ā hū va vajrodake hū svāhā ||

SA21n1412:32: etāḥ pāramitā ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam ||

SA21n1412:124: tathā mamānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca |
SA21n1412:125: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥprakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ ||
SA21n1412:127: sarvaprakāraṃ jagato hitāya kuryāmajastraṃ sukhasaṃhitāya || iti ||
SA21n1412:129: tadāvasāne'mṛtakuṇḍalivalibhāṇḍe śaṅkhodakaculukaṃ dadyādanena om hrīṃ ācamanaṃ [prokṣaṇaṃ] praticcha svāhā |
SA21n1412:130: bhāvanā | tato yaṃkāreṇa vāyumaṇḍalaṃ raṃkāreṇāgnimaṇḍalaṃ tadupari trimuṇḍakṛtacūḍikopari sitapadmabhājanaṃ tatra bhaktādiparipūritaṃ tatropari bru ā ji kha hu lāṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ vaṃkārajātaḥ pañcāmṛtapañcapradīparupaṃ niṣpādya tato garuḍamudrāṃ darśayet |

SA21n1412:134: jaḥ hu va horiti mudrāṃ pradarśya indrādidaśadikpālalokapālamudrāṃ ca pradarśya pūrvādikrameṇa balibhāṇḍe puṣpaṃ pātayedebhirmantraiḥ |
SA21n1412:155: bibhrāṇaṃ buddhabimbaṃ divasakaradhara rāśi yā bindulekham |
SA21n1412:156: maitrīyaṃ cārurūpaṃ śirasi varatanuṃ mañjughoṣaṃ ca gātram ||
SA21n1412:160: indrādivajrī saha devasaṃghairimaṃ ca gṛhṇantu baliṃ viśiṣṭam |
SA21n1412:163: devāḥ samastā bhuvi ye ca nāgāḥ dharādharā guhyagaṇaiḥ sametāḥ ||

SA21n1412:166: hṛṣṭāḥ prasannāḥ sraggandhāmālyaṃ puṣpaṃ balirdhūpavilepanaṃ ca |
SA21n1412:167: gṛhṇantu bhuñjantu pibantu cedaṃ idaṃ ca karmaṃ safalaṃ bhavenme ||
SA21n1412:168: hu hufaṭ faṭ svāhā punastathaiva ca |
